title: Chairman Schiff Statement on August 29 Kabul Strike
summary: “We must take every precaution when it comes to protecting civilian lives, and hold ourselves accountable when we fail. While there is no overstating the chaotic and dangerous situation in Kabul following the fall of the Afghan government and the attack on our forces by ISIS-K, it is clear that the August 29 strike was a mistake with horrific consequences. “In acknowledging that error, the Departm...

title: Chairman Schiff Statement on President Biden’s Decision to Withhold Military Aid from Egypt
summary: “For far too long, we have failed to hold regimes who commit grievous human rights abuses accountable. Withholding a significant portion of military aid from Egypt due to the country’s continued mistreatment of its own citizens is an appropriate step, and we must follow through when it comes to protecting fundamental freedoms and democracy.
